verses.verse: Moreover thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>: with <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> of <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> them. of cunning: Heb. the work of a cunning workman, or, embroiderer

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> shall be <S%H8083>eight<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: and every one of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%>.

The <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be coupled <S%H2266>together<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another<s%>; and other <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> to <S%H269>another<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> upon the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> from the <S%H7098>selvedge<s%> in the <S%H2279>coupling<s%>; and likewise shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H7020>uttermost<s%> <S%H8193>edge<s%> of another <S%H3407>curtain<s%>, in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%>.

<S%H2572>Fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%>; that the <S%H3924>loops<s%> may take <S%H6901>hold<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> of <S%H269>another<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>taches<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> together <S%H802>with<s%> <S%H269><s%> the <S%H7165>taches<s%>: and it shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair to be a <S%H168>covering<s%> upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>: <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%>.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> shall be <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: and the <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> shall be all of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H2266>couple<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by themselves, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by themselves, and shalt <S%H3717>double<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> in the <S%H4136>forefront<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that is <S%H7020>outmost<s%> in the <S%H2279>coupling<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> in the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> which <S%H2279>coupleth<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>taches<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H7165>taches<s%> into the <S%H3924>loops<s%>, and <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> together, that it may be <S%H259>one<s%>. tent: or, covering

And the <S%H5629>remnant<s%> that <S%H5736>remaineth<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>, the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> that <S%H5736>remaineth<s%>, shall <S%H5628>hang<s%> over the <S%H268>backside<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And a <S%H520>cubit<s%> on the one <S%H2088>side<s%>, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> on the other side of that which <S%H5736>remaineth<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>, it shall <S%H5628>hang<s%> over the <S%H6654>sides<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> on this side and on that side, to <S%H3680>cover<s%> it. of that: Heb. in the remainder, or, surplus

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H352>rams'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> standing <S%H5975>up<s%>.

<S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H7175>board<s%>, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>.

<S%H8147>Two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%> shall there be in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>, set in <S%H7947>order<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> against <S%H269>another<s%>: thus shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> for all the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>. tenons: Heb. hands
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> under the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>.
And for the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> there shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>:

And their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>.
And for the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>.
And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> for the <S%H4742>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in the two <S%H3411>sides<s%>.

And they shall be <S%H8382>coupled<s%> together <S%H4295>beneath<s%>, and they shall be <S%H8382>coupled<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> above the <S%H7218>head<s%> of it unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2885>ring<s%>: thus shall it be for them <S%H8147>both<s%>; they shall be for the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%>. coupled: Heb. twinned

And they shall be <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>; <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>,

And <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, for the two <S%H3411>sides<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>.
And the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H7175>boards<s%> shall <S%H1272>reach<s%> from <S%H7097>end<s%> to <S%H7097>end<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H6823>overlay<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And thou shalt rear <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> according to the <S%H4941>fashion<s%> thereof which was <S%H7200>shewed<s%> thee in the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6532>vail<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> of <S%H2803>cunning<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>: with <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>made<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H5414>hang<s%> it upon <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> wood <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>: their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> shall be of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, upon the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And thou shalt hang <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%> under the <S%H7165>taches<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H935>bring<s%> in thither <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>: and the <S%H6532>vail<s%> shall <S%H914>divide<s%> unto you between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place and the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> upon the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.

And thou shalt <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6532>vail<s%>, and the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> on the <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%>, of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8438>scarlet<s%> <S%H8144><s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, <S%H4639>wrought<s%> with <S%H7551>needlework<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> for the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> wood, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> shall be of <S%H2091>gold<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> for them.
